PageTitle: display mpls bfd session protocol sr-te
FuncDef: The display mpls bfd session protocol sr-te command displays information about dynamic BFD for SR-MPLS TE tunnels.
CLIs: display mpls bfd session protocol sr-te
display mpls bfd session protocol sr-te verbose
Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls bfd session protocol sr-te
FEC             DISC  OUT IF           NEXTHOP         TUNNEL         STATE
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about SR-MPLS TE LSPs monitored by BFD, run the display mpls bfd session protocol sr-te command. The command output includes the destination address and outbound interface name of an SR-MPLS TE LSP, the local discriminator of the dynamic BFD session, and the status of an MPLS BFD session.
